resources.string: Mesh overlay to mitigate screen burn-in

The 'Doto' font was created by Óliver Lalan.

See license details:

DISCLAIMER

Using any app, including this app, in continuous long-term display may result in your device's screen retaining some portion(s) of the displayed content permanently, also known as 'burn-in'.

While several mitigation features are in place in this app to prevent 'burn-in', this application is provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind, express or implied.

The developers make no representations or warranties regarding the app's performance, reliability, or suitability for any particular purpose. Users assume all risks associated with the use of this application, including but not limited to potential screen damage, data loss, or device malfunction.

The developers shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from or related to the use of this application, including but not limited to screen burn-in, hardware damage, or loss of device functionality.

By using this application, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these terms.

Use of this application constitutes acceptance of all risks and release of the developers from any claims or damages that may arise from such use.
